titleStmt.title: Donation of 25 maṟuntuḍlu under the rule of Erikalmuturāju

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Updating toward the encoding template v03

div.p:
svasti
śrī Eri
kalmutu
rāju
la na
ruma
pannasa

Ēḻeri
pāṟaku
Irupa
diyadi
Ēnu ma
ṟuntuḍla
rācamā
naṁbuna
Iccina
datti dīniṁ
ḻacuvā
nṟu
Svasti! Na[.]ruma[.] of the Erikalmuturāju (gave) the (pa)nna(sa). [...] The donation of 25 mattars according to royal measure was given to the brahmin of Ēḻer(u). Who destroys this [...].

The inscription was noted in A. R. No. 392 of 1904 and published by J. Ramayya Pantulu in
333 606 with few metadata and without translation and picture. It was re-edited on grounds of the Ramayya Pantulu's edition by K. M. Sastri in
333-334 69 with the following summary: States that during the reign of Erikal Muturāju a grant of twenty-five maṟutus of land by royal measure was made to a brahmin
334
.
